2102290.name: Snow Problem Demo
2102290.description:
The demo version of Snow Problem contains the first 12 levels of the game to give you a taste of the gameplay. Whilst one or two of the levels will provide you with a certain amount of challenge, obviously the later levels are MUCH more difficult.

Your progress in the demo will carry over into the full game.

(The ;level editor is not included in the demo version.)
